metadata.description: The Cult of Uhlume is no more, and the city of Umber nurses its wounds, as do the reluctant heroes who saved it. Trauma and tragedy have left their mark on Emerane, the lowly barmaid. But when Asps target the city's Alderman, as well as its champion, the Furie, she finds herself donning the mantle of the Night once again, and coming to their defense -- whether she's ready or not.
metadata.name: Night's Dominion: Season Two
